com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface UpstreamConnectionService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface UpstreamConnectionService
extends Service

A service that allows access to information about the current upstream connection. This service can be used to query the current polling intervals and to request notification when the polling intervals change.

Since:
5.2.3
Author:
Robert Clark

Nested Class Summary
static interface UpstreamConnectionService.Listener
          A listener interface that can be implemented by agents to receive notifications of changes to the upstream polling interval.
 
Method Summary
 long getMaxPollingInterval()
          Returns the maximum delay between connections to the upstream server, in milliseconds.
 long getMinPollingInterval()
          Returns the minimum delay between connections to the upstream server, in milliseconds.
 void registerListener(UpstreamConnectionService.Listener listener)
          Adds a listener that will be called when the polling interval is changed by the upstream host.
 void unregisterListener(UpstreamConnectionService.Listener listener)
          Removes a listener that was being called when the polling interval is changed by the upstream host.
 

Method Detail

getMaxPollingInterval

Returns the maximum delay between connections to the upstream server, in milliseconds.

Returns:
the maximum polling interval, in ms.

getMinPollingInterval

long getMinPollingInterval()
Returns the minimum delay between connections to the upstream server, in milliseconds.

Returns:
the minimum polling interval, in ms.

registerListener

void registerListener(UpstreamConnectionService.Listener listener)
Adds a listener that will be called when the polling interval is changed by the upstream host.

unregisterListener

void unregisterListener(UpstreamConnectionService.Listener listener)
Removes a listener that was being called when the polling interval is changed by the upstream host.
